including users with disabilities We follow specific Commonwealth enterprise standards designed to meet the needs of our citizens with disabilities The Commonwealth enterprise standards are generally based on standards used by the federal government for technology accessibility for people with disabilities as well as web content accessibility guidelines developed by the World Wide Web Consortium
